Class Boys

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Boys
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeekBoy, GenerousBoy, MiserBoy

    public abstract class Boys
extends java.lang.Object

    Boys Class

    This abstract class contains basic information about Boys and methods to retrieve those information.

    Since:
    2017-04-10

      • Boys

        public Boys(java.lang.String name,
            int type,
            int attractiveness,
            int intelligence,
            int budget,
            int minAttractiveness)

        Constructor to initialise attributes for Boys Object

        Parameters:
        name - Boy's Name
        type - Boy's Type 0, 1 or 2
        attractiveness - Boy's attractiveness on scale of 1-10
        intelligence - Boy's intelligence on scale of 1-10
        budget - budget for girlfriend
        minAttractiveness - Minimum requirement for GF's attractiveness
